value: directions=15 km south-east on the road to the capital Podgorica, (8km from the village of Bogetići)
content=Ostrog Monastery, especially Upper Ostrog is one of the most popular religious touristic destinations in Montenegro. Built in XVII century.

One of the most popular beers in Montenegro, Nikšićko beer, is brewed in Nikšić. It is definitely a good choice instead of expensive imported beers.
